testcase.name: CompanyRegistration > has proper accessibility attributes
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > renders file upload area with correct styling
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > accepts valid PDF file
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > accepts valid DOC file
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > accepts valid DOCX file
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > rejects invalid file type
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > rejects file larger than 5MB
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > allows removing uploaded file
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > clears file error when valid file is uploaded
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > displays file size in MB correctly
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > handles file upload without selecting file
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > shows upload area when no file is selected
CompanyRegistration > File Upload Functionality > shows file details when file is selected
CompanyRegistration > Form Integration with File Upload > submits form successfully with constitution file
CompanyRegistration > Form Integration with File Upload > maintains file selection during form validation
